Joe Biden: s convention speech was continuous and lasted nearly 25 minutes.
Biden: s speech was carried live by several TV stations, streamed live by multiple news organizations, and attended in person by dozens of people.
There were roughly three dozen reporters: camera crews, campaign staffers, and Secret Service agents present at the venue during Biden's speech.
The claims made by conservative media pe: such as Rush Limbaugh, that Biden's speech was pre-taped and edited are inaccurate.
